1.00.03.name: wordpress/safewallet-affiliate
1.00.03.description: Start earning revenues from the least expected page in your blog, the Forgot Your Password page, with this uber cool affiliate plugin. This plugin adds a short recommendation link to users to download SafeWallet Password Manager at the bottom of the Forgot Your Password page of your blog with your unique affiliate ID. Earn 40% of each SafeWallet license sold from your affiliated site - generate revenues from a page that had no commercial value up until this plugin.
